languages.text: "Традиция ритуального пребывания в праздности, свойственная мирянам, признана фрустрирующей. Коэффициент полезности данной единицы падает. Фиксирую страдание".
"The tradition of ritualised idleness peculiar to the laity has been deemed frustrating. The utility factor of this unit is falling. I am registering anguish."
languages.original_text: "Традиция ритуального пребывания в праздности, свойственная мирянам, признана фрустрирующей. Коэффициент полезности данной единицы падает. Фиксирую страдание".

languages.text: “庸俗之人特有的怠惰仪式，这样的传统令人沮丧不已。本单位的效用系数正在下降，本单位感到痛苦。”
languages.original_text: "The tradition of ritualised idleness peculiar to the laity has been deemed frustrating. The utility factor of this unit is falling. I am registering anguish."

traits.locale_text: “庸俗之人特有的怠惰仪式，这样的传统令人沮丧不已。本单位的效用系数正在下降，本单位感到痛苦。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « L'oisiveté rituelle traditionnelle des profanes a été jugée frustrante. Le facteur d'utilité de cette unité est en chute libre. Je détecte une certaine angoisse. »
languages.original_text: "The tradition of ritualised idleness peculiar to the laity has been deemed frustrating. The utility factor of this unit is falling. I am registering anguish."

traits.locale_text: « L'oisiveté rituelle traditionnelle des profanes a été jugée frustrante. Le facteur d'utilité de cette unité est en chute libre. Je détecte une certaine angoisse. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «La tradición del ritual de inactividad característico de los laicos es frustrante. El factor de utilidad de esta unidad disminuye. Registro sensaciones de angustia».
languages.original_text: "The tradition of ritualised idleness peculiar to the laity has been deemed frustrating. The utility factor of this unit is falling. I am registering anguish."

traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「俗人に特徴的だが、儀式化されたために無為になった伝統はいらだたしいものである。当ユニットの実働因子が低下している。苦痛を記録」
languages.original_text: "The tradition of ritualised idleness peculiar to the laity has been deemed frustrating. The utility factor of this unit is falling. I am registering anguish."

traits.locale_text: 「俗人に特徴的だが、儀式化されたために無為になった伝統はいらだたしいものである。当ユニットの実働因子が低下している。苦痛を記録」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Die Tradition des ritualisieren Müßiggangs, welche vom Laienstand gepflegt wird, wurde für frustrierend befunden. Der Nützlichkeitsfaktor dieser Einheit geht zurück. Ich registriere Pein."
languages.original_text: "The tradition of ritualised idleness peculiar to the laity has been deemed frustrating. The utility factor of this unit is falling. I am registering anguish."

languages.original_text: "The tradition of ritualised idleness peculiar to the laity has been deemed frustrating. The utility factor of this unit is falling. I am registering anguish."

languages.text: "Ruhban dışı sınıfa özgü, ritüelleştirilmiş aylaklık geleneği can sıkıcı olarak görüldü. Bu birimin işlevsellik faktöründe sorun tespit edildi. Kederli olduğunu kaydediyorum."
languages.original_text: "The tradition of ritualised idleness peculiar to the laity has been deemed frustrating. The utility factor of this unit is falling. I am registering anguish."

traits.locale_text: "Kâfirlere özgü, ritüelleştirilmiş aylaklık geleneği can sıkıcı olarak sayıldı. Bu birimin işlevsellik faktöründe sorun tespit edildi. Keder girdisi kaydediliyor."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
